headline: Is GoDaddy’s Recent 36% Drop Signaling a Mispriced Opportunity in 2025?
summary: Wondering if GoDaddy is a hidden value play or if the current stock price really tells the full story? You're in the right place to get a clear perspective on what GoDaddy could actually be worth. The stock has dipped recently, with a -2.0% return over the past week and a -36.1% slide year-to-date, despite strong gains of 67.4% in the last three years. Much of the recent volatility has been tied to broader tech sector shifts, as well as notable M&A rumors and evolving sentiment around...
